national_indicator_available: Female victims of sexual violence by an intimate partner
comparison_sdg: The time series is partly compliant with the UN metadata.
indicator_name: Proportion of ever-partnered women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to physical, sexual or psychological violence by a current or former intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by form of violence and by age
target_name: Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
un_designated_tier_url_alert: der Statistischen Division der Vereinten Nationen
un_custodian_agency:
United Nations Childrens Fund (UNICEF)
The United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women (UN Women)
United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA)
World Health Organization (WHO)
United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
goal_meta_link_alert: the Statistical Devision of the UN
source_organisation_1: Bundeskriminalamt
source_organisation_2: Federal Statistical Office (Destatis)
source_url_text_2b: Population data based on Census 2022 (only available in German)

footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• The data is based on a special evaluation and is not publicly available.
• For victims recorded in the reporting year, the year in which the offence was committed may also be prior to the reporting year (initial statistics). Persons who were recorded as victims multiple times in the reporting year are counted multiple times accordingly.
• Due to methodological changes, data is only available from 2018 onwards. For further information, see ‘3. Description of the data’ in the national metadata.

footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• Number of victims per 100,000 inhabitants (V/100,000): Number of victims per 100,000 inhabitants, based on the population on 31 December of the previous year. Own calculation based on the 2022 census.
• The data is based on a special evaluation and is not publicly available.
• For victims recorded in the reporting year, the year in which the offence was committed may also be prior to the reporting year (initial statistics). Persons who were recorded as victims multiple times in the reporting year are counted multiple times accordingly.
• Due to methodological changes, data is only available from 2018 onwards. For further information, see ‘3. Description of the data’ in the national metadata.

footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• The calculation is based on the retroactively calculated average population. This was determined for 2018 to 2021 on the basis of the 2022 census.
• The data is based on a special evaluation and is not publicly available.
• For victims recorded in the reporting year, the year in which the offence was committed may also be prior to the reporting year (initial statistics). Persons who were recorded as victims multiple times in the reporting year are counted multiple times accordingly.
• Due to methodological changes, data is only available from 2018 onwards. For further information, see ‘3. Description of the data’ in the national metadata.
